Package com.mc.helper

Class JDBCQuery

java.lang.Object
com.mc.helper.JDBCConnector
com.mc.helper.JDBCQuery
public abstract class JDBCQuery extends JDBCConnector
Abstract class that queries a connected MySQl Database and returns the specified data. Extends JDBCConnector.

    • getOverlappingAppointmentList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getOverlappingAppointmentList(Timestamp startTimestamp, Timestamp endTimestamp, int appointmentId)
      Retrieves a list of overlapping appointments based on the provided start and end timestamps and excluding a specific appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      startTimestamp - The start timestamp to compare.
      endTimestamp - The end timestamp to compare.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to exclude from the search.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of overlapping appointments.
